channel.title: Standard upgrade fails for whonix/KVM 15.0.1.4.9
channel.description:
I'm running on Ubuntu 20.04 Installed whonix/KVM 15.0.1.4.9 Configured it according to instructions. All went well.
When upgrading either Whonix-Gateway or Whonix-Workstation, both showed errors.
Console output... $ sudo apt-get update Ign:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease Ign:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease Ign:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease Err:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease Could not connect to 127.0.0.1:9050 (127.0.0.1). - connect (111: Connection refused) Ign:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease Ign:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster-updates InRelease Ign:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease Ign:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease Ign:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster-updates InRelease Ign:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease Ign:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease Ign:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster-updates InRelease Ign:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease Err:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease Could not connect to 127.0.0.1:9050 (127.0.0.1). - connect (111: Connection refused) Err:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster-updates InRelease Unable to connect to 127.0.0.1:9050: Err:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease Unable to connect to 127.0.0.1:9050: Reading package lists... Done W: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security/dists/buster/updates/InRelease Could not connect to 127.0.0.1:9050 (127.0.0.1). - connect (111: Connection refused) W: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian/dists/buster-updates/InRelease Unable to connect to 127.0.0.1:9050: W: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian/dists/buster/InRelease Unable to connect to 127.0.0.1:9050: W: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.whonix.org/dists/buster/InRelease Could not connect to 127.0.0.1:9050 (127.0.0.1). - connect (111: Connection refused) W: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead. user@host:~$

item.title: Standard upgrade fails for whonix/KVM 15.0.1.4.9
item.dc:creator: dev001
item.description:
I’m running on Ubuntu 20.04
Installed whonix/KVM 15.0.1.4.9
Configured it according to instructions.
All went well.

When upgrading either Whonix-Gateway or Whonix-Workstation, both showed errors.

Console output…
$ sudo apt-get update
Ign:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease
Ign:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease
Ign:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease
Err:1 tor+https://deb.whonix.org buster InRelease
Could not connect to 127.0.0.1:9050 (127.0.0.1). - connect (111: Connection refused)
Ign:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease
Ign:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster-updates InRelease
Ign:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease
Ign:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease
Ign:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster-updates InRelease
Ign:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease
Ign:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease
Ign:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster-updates InRelease
Ign:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease
Err:2 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security buster/updates InRelease
Could not connect to 127.0.0.1:9050 (127.0.0.1). - connect (111: Connection refused)
Err:3 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster-updates InRelease
Unable to connect to 127.0.0.1:9050:
Err:4 tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian buster InRelease
Unable to connect to 127.0.0.1:9050:
Reading package lists… Done
W: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian-security/dists/buster/updates/InRelease Could not connect to 127.0.0.1:9050 (127.0.0.1). - connect (111: Connection refused)
W: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian/dists/buster-updates/InRelease Unable to connect to 127.0.0.1:9050:
W: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.debian.org/debian/dists/buster/InRelease Unable to connect to 127.0.0.1:9050:
W: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.whonix.org/dists/buster/InRelease Could not connect to 127.0.0.1:9050 (127.0.0.1). - connect (111: Connection refused)
